name: Sruti Sainathuni
bio: Sruti Akka brings energy and creativity to the team, inspiring new ideas and uplifting everyone around her.

name: Tanvi Pothireddy
bio: Tanvi crafts delicious baked goods with care, passion, and attention to detail.

name: Hasita Pola
bio: Hasita loves experimenting in the kitchen and creating warm, comforting treats.

name: Sweety Chekuri
bio: Sweety helps shape the brand’s visual identity and brings creative ideas to life.

name: Namita Bhavanam
bio: Namita contributes to the bakery’s design direction and ensures a cohesive brand experience.

name: Pravallika Kullampalle
bio: Pravallika works across design, marketing, and product storytelling, helping shape the bakery’s brand and customer experience.

name: Geetika Kullampalle
bio: Geetika manages the bakery’s online presence and helps connect with the community.

name: Tapaswini Bhavanam
bio: Tapaswini curates engaging content and helps grow the bakery’s digital reach.
